sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PDF_O101M ( DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY__69323 , DAT_CD , HLTH_AMT_MN , HI_NTF , LTRM_NTF , HI_PMT , LTRM_PMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR ) VALUES ( #dpobCd# , #yrtxBlggYr# , #clutSeptCd# , #systemkey69323# , #datCd# , #hlthAmtMn# , #hiNtf# , #ltrmNtf# , #hiPmt# , #ltrmPmt# , #kybdr# , #inptDt# , #inptAddr# , #ismt# , #revnDt# , #revnAddr# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PDF_O101M SET DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# , YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# , CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# , SYSTEMKEY__69323=#systemkey69323# , DAT_CD=#datCd# , HLTH_AMT_MN=#hlthAmtMn# , HI_NTF=#hiNtf# , LTRM_NTF=#ltrmNtf# , HI_PMT=#hiPmt# , LTRM_PMT=#ltrmPmt# , KYBDR=#kybdr# , INPT_DT=#inptDt# , INPT_ADDR=#inptAddr# , ISMT=#ismt# , REVN_DT=#revnDt# , REVN_ADDR=#revnAddr# WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY__69323=#systemkey69323# AND DAT_CD=#datCd# AND HLTH_AMT_MN=#hlthAmtMn#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PDF_O101M WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY__69323=#systemkey69323# AND DAT_CD=#datCd# AND HLTH_AMT_MN=#hlthAmtMn#
sqlMap.select: SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY__69323 , DAT_CD , HLTH_AMT_MN , HI_NTF , LTRM_NTF , HI_PMT , LTRM_PMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_O101M WHERE DPOB_CD=#dpobCd# AND YRTX_BLGG_YR=#yrtxBlggYr# AND CLUT_SEPT_CD=#clutSeptCd# AND SYSTEMKEY__69323=#systemkey69323# AND DAT_CD=#datCd# AND HLTH_AMT_MN=#hlthAmtMn#

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RNUM FROM ( SELECT DPOB_CD , YRTX_BLGG_YR , CLUT_SEPT_CD , SYSTEMKEY__69323 , DAT_CD , HLTH_AMT_MN , HI_NTF , LTRM_NTF , HI_PMT , LTRM_PMT , KYBDR , INPT_DT , INPT_ADDR , ISMT , REVN_DT , REVN_ADDR FROM PDF_O101M WHERE 1=1
DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY DPOB_CD DESC , YRTX_BLGG_YR DESC , CLUT_SEPT_CD DESC , SYSTEMKEY__69323 DESC , DAT_CD DESC , HLTH_AMT_MN DESC
) A WHERE ROWNUM <= #lastIndex# )WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex#

DPOB_CD = #searchKeyword#
YRTX_BLGG_YR LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
